text: nice! ill give that a go, thanks!

Hello, everyone!

Can you tell me how to properly track Line Item changes in a deals?

I haven't found Webhooks or change `num_associated_line_item` on the fly.

Without crutches is there any way to track changes?

Hi
Is it possible to update the labels of properties of a custom object after having created it?

Hey <@U02DGR3SB4Y>

I think you can use this API to list out Contact properties from HubSpot

<https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/contacts/v2/get_contacts_properties>

I am new to HS APIs and I seem to be having an issue when using Postman + API Key under my account. I keep getting 404 errors when attempting to test the CRM endpoint (<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/properties>)

It doesn't appear that *`/crm/v3/objects/{objectType}/search`*  allows for "icontains" or "contains" which would be super helpful for searching for a substring within a text property type. Am I missing something here, or is this a known limitation?
I figured out my issue. All is good now.
`/crm/v3/objects/contacts/`  I can't seem to find the Contact Owner in any of the responses. How do I do that?
Am I supposed to use the `/crm/v3/associations/` endpoint?

Hey <@U02DGJY44AV>

Have you tried to execute the get HS Contact API? The particular Get Contact API provides all the related properties details.
